original_title: Forbidden Love on the Shores of Greece
overview: A crotchety old woman heads out one morning to go bird-watching. Traveling to a nearby woods, in search of a spot to build her hide. She sets up camp and It's not long before she finds what she came for... and birds have nothing to do with it.
tagline: An innocent walk in the woods... An illicit secret... A tale best left unheard.
title: Forbidden Love on the Shores of Greece
